name: Conclusive Ovation
title: Lyney: Conclusive Ovation
in_play_description: When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the damage dealt by Lyney and your Grin-Malkin Hat will deal +2 DMG to characters affected by Pyro. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Lyney to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Lyney, equip this card.
After Lyney equips this card, immediately use Prop Arrow.
When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the DMG dealt by Lyney and your Grin-Malkin Hat will deal +2 DMG to characters affected by Pyro. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lyney in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
